code: protected static String buildMessage(Set<ConstraintViolation<Object>> constraintViolations, Object bean) {     StringBuilder buffer = new StringBuilder("Validation failed for: ").     buffer.append(bean).     buffer.append(" errors: [").     for (ConstraintViolation<Object> constraintViolation : constraintViolations) {         buffer.append("property: " + constraintViolation.getPropertyPath() + ". value: " + constraintViolation.getInvalidValue() + ". constraint: " + constraintViolation.getMessage() + ". ").     }     buffer.append("]").     return buffer.toString(). }
